attributes.action: Intervene and scrap the new London 2012 Olympics logo for a logo the country can be proud of
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Recent release of the London 2012 logo showed how spectacuarly this country can waste money. Epilepsy and the clear resemblence to Nazi symbols are only a few of the things wrong with the logo. We want the prime-minister to intervene and make the olympics committee redesign the logo for one we won't be ashamed of.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
